IRCDaemon.name: Macrosoft IRC Channel
IRCDaemon.post: Gill fucked up the other day.
He posted the Macrosoft warehouse IP and admin password in public on Tweetbook when one of our employees PM'd him about it.
Did he at least change the password?
He just added a capital A to the end of it.
So the password is now macrosoftNCC1701A
I swear to god, if you make the same mistake as he did...
It's fine, this is a private IRC channel, no one can see it.
